field.name: description
field.value: This patch suppresses output of empty markup fragments.

comment.author: kenegozi
comment.text: Applying this patch would cause the generated markup to be broken at a few places. I'd rather avoid that. If you wish to compress whitespaces you can use a ViewFilter for that, but I'd rather keep the default behaviour of template->markup transformation to be as non-intrusive as possible

comment.author: felixg
comment.text: It's an efficiency patch, but not worth the trouble of fixing all the tests. That's why I'm not big fan of unit testing.

comment.author: kenegozi
comment.text: * '''Resolution''' set to ''By Design''. * '''Version Fixed''' set to ''Future''. * '''Status''' changed from ''Open'' to ''Resolved''.
